# Listening Lorecall (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[2nd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 133

*You feel conscious of your ears as they warm noticeably. Sounds that seem as though they should be muffled become clear to you.*

You gain a +4 insight bonus on [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] (v3.5 Listen) checks. In addition, if you have 5 or more ranks in [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] (v3.5 Listen), you gain blindsense out to 30 feet. If you have 12 or more ranks in [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] (v3.5 Listen), you gain blindsight out to 15 feet.

A *[[Silence (Spell)|silence]]* spell or effect negates the blindsense or blindsight granted by a *listening lorecall* spell.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Sorcerer 2, Wizard 2 to Level per Complete Adventurer.
